question: Is it allowed for females to wear pants and shirts inside the Abaya?
answer:
QUESTION
I wear jeans (pants and tight shirts) inside my abaya. I know that women are not allowed to dress like men, but when I wear them, no one can see me. I wear them just because I am comfortable in them and I like them and I am not showing myself to others. Am I still not allowed to wear them even though no ghair mahram can see me?
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

It is not prohibited for a female to wear the type of clothing mentioned in
the details of the question inside the Abaya.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
